item.title: Five Good Books* of 2015
item.description: * Plus a few papers, videos, and other fun things. We love books, and it feels fitting to end 2015 with a round-up of a few that we thought were particularly excellent this year. Our favorite book for data science beginners: Data Science from Scratch: First Principles with Python by Joel Grus (and if you order from O’Reilly directly, use discount code PCBW and get 50% off most ebooks/videos and 40% off most print books).
